name.ja: <ruby>破<rt>は</rt></ruby><ruby>械<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby>シャバラ

text.en: During the Main Phase, if this card is in your hand (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Fiend monster, or 1 Set card, you control; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon this card, also while it is face-up in the Monster Zone, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Fiend monsters. If this card is sent to the GY: You can Set 1 "Unchained" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Unchained Soul Sharvara" once per turn.
